If you do, destroy one of your creatures at the end of your turn.) ■ When you attach this to a creature, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. {OREGA AURA}: Attach this to one of your gacharange creatures, or gacharange summon and attach this to it. property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Whenever this creature would break a shield, choose a number instead. Your opponent puts that shield face-up and puts all cards that have the same cost as that chosen number into their graveyard. Then your opponent puts the rest into their hand. TWINPACT ■ Look at a shield. You may have its owner put it on the bottom of their deck. If you do, that player puts the top card of their deck into their shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■If you attach this to a creature already attached to an aura, this aura costs 2 less to use. ■ The attached creature gets "powered breaker". If that creature leaves the battle zone, this goes to the same zone, then the gacharange creature returns to the bottom of your super gacharange.

property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have 4 or more water gacharange creatures in the battle zone, this creature gets +7000 power and has "double breaker". ■ Super Heaven Fever: Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, if you have 5 or more water gacharange creatures in the battle zone, you may put 4 other water gacharange creatures on the bottom of your super gacharange in any order. If you do, skip the rest of the turn.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Master Card

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-10 Blue C.A.P and Black DaiBanZai

property.name: Type
property.value: Orega Aura

property.name: Race
property.value: Master Dolszak/Mafi Gang/Deletron

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Great Sin of Sin Moonless Night (You may reduce the cost of using this aura by 1 for each aura in your graveyard. If you do, at the end of turn, destroy one of your creatures. It can't cost less than 1.) ■ When you attach this to a creature or whenever the attached creature attacks, choose up to 2 auras that cost 8 or less from your graveyard and attach them to that creature. ■ When this would be put into your graveyard from the battle zone, put it on the bottom of your deck instead. ■ At the end of your opponent's turn, you may put this aura on top of your deck. {OREGA AURA}: Attach this to one of your gacharange creatures, or gacharange summon and attach this to it. If that creature leaves the battle zone, this goes to the same zone, then the gacharange creature returns to the bottom of your super gacharange.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-10 Blue C.A.P and Black DaiBanZai

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SYMPATHY}: Creature (This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your creatures in the battle zone. It can't cost 0 or less.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ You may untap one of your tapped creatures to change your opponent's creatures attack to that creature or one of your tapped creatures. ■ If you have 5 or more creatures in the battle zone, whenever one of your creatures in the battle zone would be put into a zone other than your graveyard, it stays in the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-10 Blue C.A.P and Black DaiBanZai

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent shuffles their graveyard and puts it on the bottom of their deck. ■ At the end of your turn, if this creature is tapped, you may draw a card. ■ When this creature is put into your graveyard from anywhere, shuffle your graveyard and put it on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-10 Blue C.A.P and Black DaiBanZai

property.name: Type
property.value: Orega Aura

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ The attached creature gets "powered breaker". (A creature that has "powered breaker" breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.) ■ At the end of the attached creature's attack, for each shield broke during the attack, reveal the top card of your deck. Put all auras that cost 6 or less from among into the battle zone. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. {OREGA AURA}: Attach this to one of your gacharange creatures, or gacharange summon and attach this to it. If that creature leaves the battle zone, this goes to the same zone, then the gacharange creature returns to the bottom of your super gacharange.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have 4 or more spells in your graveyard, and this spell is in your shield zone, it has "shield trigger". ■ Choose 2 of the following. (You may choose the same one twice.): ► Draw a card: ► Gacharange summon. ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures and return it to its owner's hand.

Then for each of your gacharange creatures in the battle zone, you may put an aura that costs 7 or less from your mana zone into the battle zone and attach it to the attached creature. {OREGA AURA}: Attach this to one of your gacharange creatures, or gacharange summon and attach this to it.
